Package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage

Interface UpdatableLinkedUUIDsInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
PassageEditingInterface, PassageModelEditablePassageInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditablePassage
public interface UpdatableLinkedUUIDsInterface
Literally just has the updateLinkedUUIDs method, for the loops where this has to be called for every passage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updateLinkedUUIDs​(Collection<? extends SharedPassage> allPassages)
    Method that'll be used to update the set containing the UUIDs of all the passages that this passage is linked to.

  • Method Details

    • updateLinkedUUIDs

      void updateLinkedUUIDs​(Collection<? extends SharedPassage> allPassages)
      Method that'll be used to update the set containing the UUIDs of all the passages that this passage is linked to. call this for each element in the set of (? extends SharedPassages) after everything's been added to it.
      Parameters:
      allPassages - the set of all passages mapped to UUIDs (where the UUIDs will be read from basically)
